<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Bear](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=370)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 41 <sup>1.1</sup>

Bears are ferocious predators typically found in cold or temperate woodlands and hills. Many species of bear exist in addition to the two presented below, such as the smaller black bear or the arctic-dwelling polar bear.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Cave Bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2851) (Creature 6), [Grizzly Bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2850) (Creature 3)
